attributes.action: Increase the money spent on Mental Health support and research into the causes
attributes.additional_details: Personally i have seen the effects of mental health and depression, and seen how it ends. Simply this cannot carry on and i strongly believe that it hasn’t been treated properly and the support out there is simply lacklustre - to put it politely.
attributes.background: Focus more attention on mental health patients and how they are supported, new ways of support, and constant attention from mental health care teams.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616860
